product_name: Lifefactory Glass Flip Cap Water Bottle - 22 fl. oz.
long_description: On-the-go hydration is easy with the Lifefactory 22 oz. Glass Flip Cap Water Bottle. A narrow spout means spill-free drinking while a silicone sleeve lets you keep a firm grip and adds a pop of color. Glass bottle is BPA-free, dishwasher-safe and leaves no residual taste. Flip-cap spout allows one-handed drinking and doesn't leak. Wide-mouth opening allows easy filling and accommodates ice cubes. Lifefactory 22 oz. Glass Flip Cap Water Bottle includes a pivoting handle that attaches easily to your pack and swings out of the way while you drink.
